00059 #ifdef  USE_FULL_ASSERT
00060 
00069   #define assert_param(expr) ((expr) ? (void)0 : assert_failed((uint8_t *)__FILE__, __LINE__))
00070 /* Exported functions ------------------------------------------------------- */
